result.reason: The issue has a concrete repro and matches known focus/refocus edge cases in main-window message interception, so it is actionable as a bug fix.
result.approach: Tighten WndProc refocus gating so ActivateConnection runs only on true app reactivation and not during taskbar-driven window switches/minimize flows.
